select app_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into approval (app_no, app_kind, app_title, app_startdate, app_enddate, app_situation, emp_no) values (#{app_no}, #{app_kind}, #{app_title}, sysdate, null,'결재요청', #{emp_no})
insert into disbursement_doc (app_no, d_no, d_idx, d_contents, d_usingdate, d_amount) values (#{app_no}, d_no_seq.nextval, #{d_idx},#{d_contents}, #{d_usingdate}, #{d_amount})
insert into draft_doc (app_no, dd_no, dd_contents) values (#{app_no}, dd_no_seq.nextval, #{dd_contents})
insert into vacation_Doc (app_no, vd_no, vd_startdate, vd_enddate, vd_day, vd_contents) values (#{app_no}, vd_no_seq.nextval, #{vd_startdate}, #{vd_enddate}, #{vd_day}, #{vd_contents})
mapper.update: update approval set app_title=#{app_title}, app_startdate = sysdate where app_no = #{app_no}
update draft_doc set dd_contents=#{dd_contents} where app_no = #{app_no}
update disbursement_doc set d_contents=#{d_contents}, d_usingdate=#{d_usingdate}, d_amount=#{d_amount} where app_no=#{app_no}
update vacation_doc set vd_startdate=#{vd_startdate}, vd_enddate=#{vd_enddate}, vd_day=#{vd_day}, vd_contents=#{vd_contents} where app_no=#{app_no}
mapper.select: select e.*, dept_name from emp e join dept d on e.dept_no = d.dept_no
mapper.insert: insert into power (app_no, emp_no, power_defult) values(#{app_no}, #{emp_no}, '대기중')
mapper.select: select a.app_no, a.app_kind, a.APP_TITLE, a.APP_Startdate, pw.power_regdate, pw.POWER_DEFULT, a.emp_no, e.emp_name from approval a inner join power pw on a.app_no = pw.app_no inner join emp e on a.emp_no = e.emp_no where pw.emp_no = #{emp_no}

select /*+index_desc(a XPKAPPROVAL)*/ a.app_no as app_no, a.app_kind as kind, a.app_title as title, d.d_contents as content, a.app_startdate as startdate, a.app_enddate as enddate, e.emp_name as writer from approval a inner join disbursement_doc d on a.app_no = d.app_no inner join emp e on a.emp_no= e.emp_no where a.app_no = #{app_no} and a.app_kind = #{app_kind}
